comments: This class is a great way to get into Christian theology, and Prof. Rivera is incredibly knowledgable about these topics.

Prof. Rivera Rivera is one of the best instructors I've had at Harvard.  The class material is very interesting and opened up a new way of thinking for me, focusing on assumptions made by the authors and implications of the writing.  This class is a huge part of why I declared religion, so I would recommend a million times over.
